00036 #ifndef LABELBASEDCONTRACTIONCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00037 #define LABELBASEDCONTRACTIONCELLFACTORY_HPP_
00038 
00039 #include "AbstractContractionCellFactory.hpp"
00040 #include "ContractionModelName.hpp"
00041 #include "NonPhysiologicalContractionModel.hpp"
00042 #include "Kerchoffs2003ContractionModel.hpp"
00043 #include "Nash2004ContractionModel.hpp"
00044 #include "NhsModelWithBackwardSolver.hpp"
00045 #include "ConstantActiveTension.hpp"
00046 
00052 template <unsigned DIM>
00053 class LabelBasedContractionCellFactory : public AbstractContractionCellFactory<DIM>
00054 {
00055 private:
00057     ContractionModelName mContractionModelName;
00058 
00059 public:
00065     LabelBasedContractionCellFactory(ContractionModelName contractionModelName)
00066         : AbstractContractionCellFactory<DIM>(),
00067           mContractionModelName(contractionModelName)
00068     {
00069     }
00070 
00077     AbstractContractionModel* CreateContractionCellForElement(Element<DIM, DIM>* pElement)
00078     {
00079         switch(mContractionModelName)
00080         {
00081             case CONSTANT:
00082             {
00083                 return new ConstantActiveTension;
00084                 break;
00085             }
00086             case NONPHYSIOL1:
00087             case NONPHYSIOL2:
00088             case NONPHYSIOL3:
00089             {
00090                 unsigned option = (mContractionModelName==NONPHYSIOL1 ? 1 : (mContractionModelName==NONPHYSIOL2? 2 : 3));
00091                 return new NonPhysiologicalContractionModel(option);
00092                 break;
00093             }
00094             case NASH2004: //stretch dependent, will this work with explicit??
00095             {
00096                 return new Nash2004ContractionModel;
00097                 break;
00098             }
00099             case NHS:
00100             {
00101                 return new NhsModelWithBackwardSolver;
00102                 break;
00103             }
00104             case KERCHOFFS2003: //stretch dependent, will this work with explicit? Answer: can be unstable
00105             {
00106                 return new Kerchoffs2003ContractionModel;
00107                 break;
00108             }
00109             default:
00110             {
00111                 NEVER_REACHED;
00112             }
00113         }
00114 #define COVERAGE_IGNORE
00115         return NULL;  //This is included to appease compilers which analysis the NEVER_REACHED branch as not returning a pointer
00116 #undef COVERAGE_IGNORE
00117     }
00118 };
00119 
00120 #endif // LABELBASEDCONTRACTIONCELLFACTORY_HPP_
